fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do not touch. May be stolen from Minecraft.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Throw a snowball at a player, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Roleblock Immunity
> Your visits are astral.
> When you die, roleblock all your visitors the next night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the Town.
